extendedInfo.description: Over 200 interview questions with full explanations in a flashcard format. Technologies and concepts covered: .NET, C#, VB.NET, SQL, LINQ, XML, Design Patterns, OOP, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Version control, ASP.NET, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, SOLID Principles, Dependency Injection, Modular Programming, Unit Testing and Test Driven Development, ORMs, SharePoint, WCF, WF, and WPF.Learn the secrets of senior developers and take your career to the next level with these Microsoft .NET flash cards!Most of the question/answer content came from the book "How to Find and Land a Microsoft .NET Development Job" by Dave Haynes, with permission.Praise for that book:"It really is a total package. You don't need any other resource to find and land a .Net development job. The title is not misleading."- D. Stepp"It is not a cheat sheet to help you trick someone into hiring you, but rather a true preparation guide that will help you get noticed and continue to help you hone your skills after you are hired."- D. Ellerbee

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Really good reference to brush up before an interview. My only complaint is the lack of sample code for some design patterns.
reviews.author: A Google User
